nodes.description: 6:45 a.m. 市长Ronald Norick主持马拉赫大楼祈祷早餐会，1,200名官员参与
nodes.support_text: 6:45 a.m. - Mayor Ronald Norick co-sponsors a prayer breakfast at the Myriad Convention Center.

nodes.description: 7:45 a.m. 居民Jannie Coverdale带孩子前往大楼日托中心
nodes.support_text: 7:45 a.m. - Jannie Coverdale... walks the kids to the federal day care center on the second floor of the Murrah building.

nodes.description: 8:45-8:55 a.m. IRS员工Nancy Ingram和FDIC员工Susan Walton进入信用合作社
nodes.support_text: 8:45 to 8:55 a.m. - Susan Walton... arrives at the building and makes her way to the credit union on the third floor... Nancy Ingram... enters the credit union.

nodes.description: 8:59 a.m. VA员工Dianne Dooley接到同事迟到通知
nodes.support_text: 8:59 a.m. - A co-worker calls Dianne Dooley... talks to him for about two minutes.

nodes.description: 9:02 a.m. 炸弹在第三楼信用合作社引爆，摧毁北面外墙并引发大规模坍塌
nodes.support_text: 9:02 a.m. - As Dooley pushes open a door... the bomb exploded.

nodes.description: 9:04 a.m. 警察Larry Dellinger抵达现场开始初期救援
nodes.support_text: 9:04 a.m. - Highway patrolman Larry Dellinger arrives on the south side of the building.

nodes.description: 9:07 a.m. 爆炸冲击波导致玻璃持续坠落五分钟
nodes.support_text: 9:07 a.m. - Glass blown into the air is still falling.

nodes.description: 9:19 a.m. 警察应急响应队正式激活
nodes.support_text: 9:19 a.m. - The police department's Emergency Response Team... is activated.

nodes.description: 9:20 a.m. 受伤的Dianne Dooley被送医治疗
nodes.support_text: 9:20 a.m. - Dianne Dooley... arrives at the hospital with a shattered right wrist.

nodes.description: 9:30 a.m. 副警长向Jannie Coverdale通报爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: 9:30 a.m. - A deputy U.S. marshal tells Jannie Coverdale... someone exploded a bomb at the Murrah Building.

nodes.description: 9:32 a.m. 现场已集结69名警察参与救援
nodes.support_text: 9:32 a.m. - A total of 69 OKC police and highway patrol officers have helped in the rescue by this time.

nodes.description: 9:45 a.m. Dianne Dooley接受手腕和手掌手术
nodes.support_text: 9:45 a.m. - Dianne Dooley goes into surgery, and specialists begin repairing her mangled right hand.

nodes.description: 10:00 a.m. VA心理学家Paul Heath确认大楼遭轰炸
nodes.support_text: 10:00 a.m. - VA psychologist Paul Heath... realized it had been bombed.

nodes.description: 10:28 a.m. 救援发现疑似第二枚炸弹，全员撤离
nodes.support_text: 10:28 a.m. - Rescuers find what they think is a second bomb. All rescuers are ordered to leave the building.

nodes.description: 10:29 a.m. Dellinger团队坚持继续救援Nancy Ingram
nodes.support_text: 10:29 a.m. - Highway patrolman Dellinger and other rescuers... refuse to leave the building.

nodes.description: 10:30 a.m. 涉事者Timothy McVeigh因无牌驾驶被捕
nodes.support_text: 10:30 a.m. - Timothy McVeigh is pulled over by an Oklahoma Highway patrolman... He is arrested.

nodes.description: 10:35-11:15 a.m. Dellinger团队成功解救被埋Nancy Ingram
nodes.support_text: 10:35 a.m. to 11:15 a.m. - Sometime during this period Dellinger and the others are able to lift a huge piece of concrete wall off of Ingram's feet.

nodes.description: 11:22 a.m. 炸弹 squad确认无第二枚炸弹
nodes.support_text: 11:22 a.m. - The bomb squad reports that there is no second bomb.

nodes.description: 11:23 a.m. 多部门联合指挥中心正式成立
nodes.support_text: 11:23 a.m. - A main command post is established with agency heads... all meeting there.

nodes.description: 11:45 a.m. 野战医院在邮局设立完成
nodes.support_text: 11:45 a.m. - A field hospital is set up in the post office across street.

nodes.description: 11:55 a.m. 警察设立受害者家属支持中心
nodes.support_text: 11:55 a.m. - An OKC police chaplain sets up support center.

nodes.description: Early afternoon 州长Keating宣布进入州级灾难状态
nodes.support_text: Early afternoon - Oklahoma Gov. Keating officially declares a state disaster.

nodes.description: 2 p.m. 州长与救援指挥团队会商
nodes.support_text: 2 p.m. - Gov. Keating goes to site and meets with those leading the rescue operation.

nodes.description: Mid-afternoon Dellinger成功救出地下室被困女性
nodes.support_text: Mid-afternoon - Larry Dellinger helps free a woman trapped in the basement.

nodes.description: 3:05 p.m. 总统克林顿举行首次白宫记者会
nodes.support_text: 3:05 p.m. - President Clinton addresses White House reporters.

nodes.description: 4:30 p.m. 克林顿宣布联邦灾难区并启动FEMA援助
nodes.support_text: 4:30 p.m. - President Clinton declares the site... a federal disaster area.

nodes.description: 5:00 p.m. 炸弹残留物证据回收行动开始
nodes.support_text: 5:00 p.m. - Federal and local bomb squads start evidence recovery.

nodes.description: 7:00 p.m. 救援人员发现最后幸存者Brandi Liggons
nodes.support_text: 7:00 p.m. - Rescuers find Brandi Liggons, 15, trapped in the rubble.

nodes.description: 9-10 p.m. 15岁少女Brandi Liggons被成功救出
nodes.support_text: 9 to 10 p.m. - Liggons is brought out of the building.

nodes.description: 11:00 p.m. 累计死亡人数升至31人（含12名儿童）
nodes.support_text: 11:00 p.m. - The death toll is at 31, including 12 children.

nodes.description: 卡车装载燃油和化肥
nodes.support_text: 卡车装载燃油和化肥

nodes.description: 卡车被开往城市
nodes.support_text: 卡车被开往城市

nodes.description: 卡车停放在大楼北侧

nodes.support_text: 40英里外的人感受到震动

nodes.description: 冲击波击碎所有商业区窗户
nodes.support_text: 冲击波击碎所有商业区窗户

nodes.description: 168人（含19名儿童和2名救援员）因爆炸死亡
nodes.support_text: 168人（含19名儿童和2名救援员）因爆炸死亡

nodes.description: 近600人受伤
nodes.support_text: 近600人受伤

nodes.support_text: 炸弹冲击波剥离建筑北侧

nodes.description: 冲击波将人员与水泥抛入地下室

nodes.support_text: Dooley被抛到地面

nodes.support_text: Shaw从二楼坠落

nodes.description: Shaw被困在瓦砾中

nodes.description: Hall和Walton被水泥和管道掩埋

nodes.description: 人员已安全撤离
nodes.support_text: 人员已安全撤离

nodes.description: 警员开始帮助人员
nodes.support_text: 警员开始帮助人员

nodes.description: 警员开始抵达
nodes.support_text: 警员开始抵达

nodes.description: 保罗·希思看到建筑损毁的北部区域
nodes.support_text: 保罗·希思看到建筑损毁的北部区域

nodes.description: 简要汇报救援和调查进展

nodes.description: 命令提供联邦资源

nodes.description: 被拒绝进入建筑

nodes.description: 希望找到幸存者

edges.support_text: 7:45 a.m. - Jannie Coverdale... walks the kids to the federal day care center.
8:45 to 8:55 a.m. - Susan Walton... arrives at the building.
8:59 a.m. - A co-worker calls Dianne Dooley.
9:02 a.m. - As Dooley pushes open a door... the bomb exploded.
9:04 a.m. - Highway patrolman Larry Dellinger arrives.
9:07 a.m. - Glass blown into the air is still falling.
9:19 a.m. - The police department's Emergency Response Team... is activated.
9:04 a.m. 警察Larry Dellinger抵达现场开始初期救援
9:20 a.m. - Dianne Dooley... arrives at the hospital.
9:30 a.m. - A deputy U.S. marshal tells Jannie Coverdale.
9:20 a.m. 受伤的Dianne Dooley被送医治疗
9:32 a.m. - A total of 69 OKC police... have helped in the rescue.
9:45 a.m. - Dianne Dooley goes into surgery.
10:00 a.m. - VA psychologist Paul Heath... realized it had been bombed.
9:45 a.m. - Dianne Dooley goes into surgery, and specialists begin repairing her mangled right hand.
10:28 a.m. - Rescuers find what they think is a second bomb.
10:00 a.m. - VA psychologist Paul Heath... realized it had been bombed.
10:29 a.m. - Highway patrolman Dellinger... refuse to leave the building.
10:30 a.m. - Timothy McVeigh is pulled over by an Oklahoma Highway patrolman.
10:29 a.m. - Highway patrolman Dellinger and other rescuers refuse to leave the building.
10:35 a.m. to 11:15 a.m. - Sometime during this period Dellinger and the others are able to lift a huge piece of concrete wall.
10:30 a.m. - Timothy McVeigh is pulled over by an Oklahoma Highway patrolman.
11:22 a.m. - The bomb squad reports that there is no second bomb.
11:23 a.m. - A main command post is established with agency heads... all meeting there.
11:45 a.m. - A field hospital is set up in the post office across street.
11:55 a.m. - An OKC police chaplain sets up support center.
Early afternoon - Oklahoma Gov. Keating officially declares a state disaster.
2 p.m. - Gov. Keating goes to site and meets with those leading the rescue operation.
Mid-afternoon - Larry Dellinger helps free a woman trapped in the basement.
3:05 p.m. - President Clinton addresses White House reporters.
4:30 p.m. - President Clinton declares the site... a federal disaster area.
5:00 p.m. - Federal and local bomb squads start evidence recovery.
7:00 p.m. - Rescuers find Brandi Liggons, 15, trapped in the rubble.
9 to 10 p.m. - Liggons is brought out of the building.
11:00 p.m. - The death toll is at 31, including 12 children.
